title: Caribbean Bears International Gathering
desc:
The Greatest and Largest Bear Gathering in Latin America with over 500 attendees expected will take place in the best setting of the Mexican Caribbean... Cancun!!! 
 Join us and bears from around the globe for the best 5 days of your bear life with so much fun you won't even know what to do!!! 
 ? 
 FAQs 
 ? 
 Are there ID requirements or an age limit to enter the event? 
 Age limit is 18 years old however at the Host Hotel the minimum age limit is 21 
 ? 
 What can/can't I bring to the event? 
 No drugs, alcohol, pets 
 ? 
 Where can I contact the organizer with any questions? 
 Info@caribbeanbears.com 
 877-540-5514 toll free USA 
 001-310-402-7588 WhatSapp World 
 ? 
 Is my registration/ticket transferrable? 
 No, each ticket is personal, no exchanging? 
 ? 
 Can I update my registration information? 
 Yes 
 ? 
 Do I have to bring my printed ticket to the event? 
 You have to print your reservation confirmation or your WU transfer receipt. 
 ? 
 What is the refund policy? 
 For Refund policy please check our website below the event packages. 
 ? 
 The name on the registration/ticket doesn't match the attendee. Is that okay? 
 Each ticket is personal and to avoid any problems you need to make sure the ticketing hold has your name on it
